messageBody:
bskmohan wrote:
> hello group,
>
> When i was unit testing my SAX parser implementation to parse my xml
> file, i faced one problem. i want to test the startElement(...) method
> of the parser.I used some global variables in that and it returns
> nothing. how to test such methods using junit. pls inform me ASAP.

Global data makes testing more difficult, so I'd avoid it if possible.
Do you have control over instantiating your SAX event handler? (It's
been over 5 years since I implemented one, so I can't remember.) If so,
you can pass in any objects your event handler needs so they don't have
to be globals.

Once you have that, you can pass in test doubles for those collaborators
to test how your event handler talks to them. Read the JMock tutorial
online at jmock.org.

Good luck.
